title: Single Mode Fiber Optic Cable (1km)
description: High-quality 24-core single mode fiber optic cable for outdoor telecommunication networks. UV resistant jacket.

title: 48-Port Gigabit Ethernet Switch
description: Managed rack-mount switch with 48 Gigabit ports and 4 SFP+ uplinks. Ideal for enterprise networks.

title: Fiber Optic Splice Closure (Dome Type)
description: Waterproof dome splice closure for up to 144 fibers. IP68 rated for underground and aerial use.

title: Cat6a Ethernet Cable Spool (1000ft)
description: Shielded twisted pair (STP) Cat6a cable for high-speed data transmission. Plenum rated.

title: SFP+ Transceiver Module 10G
description: 10GBase-SR LC multi-mode transceiver, up to 300m. Compatible with major switch brands.

title: Portland Cement (50kg Bag)
description: General purpose Portland cement type I/II. Suitable for concrete, mortar, and grout.

title: Steel Rebar #4 (1/2 inch) - 20ft
description: Grade 60 deformed steel reinforcement bar for concrete structures. High tensile strength.

title: Heavy Duty Cordless Hammer Drill
description: 18V brushless motor hammer drill with 2 batteries and charger. Impact energy 2.6J.

title: Safety Helmet (Hard Hat) - White
description: OSHA compliant industrial safety helmet with adjustable suspension and chin strap.

title: Copper Wire Roll (12 AWG, 500ft)
description: THHN/THWN-2 stranded copper building wire. Heat and moisture resistant.

title: Network Rack Cabinet 42U
description: Standard 19-inch server rack cabinet with glass door and cooling fans.

title: Hydraulic Excavator Bucket Tooth
description: Forged steel replacement tooth for standard excavator buckets. Wear resistant.
